name: Wayfaring (bbleck)
description:
Current playstate (4/13/21):

Player should be fully controllable.  No skills are implemented at this time besides jump.  Right mouse click and hold to mouse-look.  WASD movement.

Goal:  get to the lake without being caught by the big baddie.

You will see the places where puzzles will eventually be, but there are no puzzles at this time.  Just explore and evade.  See if you can visit each puzzle site before getting to the lake.

Helpful playtesting questions:

1. How does the world feel?

2. How does player movement and camera movement feel?

3. General things you like?

4. General things you don't like?

5. What do you wish the game did?

6. General reaction/comments?

Developers:

Alan - World builder

Alejandro - Sound

Brian - PC, NPC, and Camera:  movement & FX

Jarek - HUD

Oscar - Puzzle

Victor - Model builder
